long_description: Consisting of at least 50% recycled EVA foam, the lightweight Manduka Uphold Foam Yoga Block provides unbeatable comfort, style and support. High-density foam; extreme durability; firm support. Soft, comfortable grip is slip-resistant. The Manduka Uphold Foam Yoga Block features radius edges for comfort and beauty.
short_description: Consisting of at least 50% recycled EVA foam, the lightweight Manduka Uphold Foam Yoga Block provides unbeatable comfort, style and support.
